label: uncl4487
comment: Code specifying a type of financial transaction.

values.label: Pre-authorised direct debit or direct debit request
values.comment: The transaction is a pre-authorised direct debit or direct debit request, i.e. a direct debit for which there is an agreed mandate that allows the creditor to draw funds from the debtor.

values.label: Non pre-authorised direct debit or direct debit request
values.comment: The transaction is a non pre-authorised direct debit or direct debit request, i.e. a direct debit for which there is no prior agreed mandate allowing the creditor to draw funds from the debtor.

values.label: Documentary payment
values.comment: Payment relating to a documentary settlement.

values.label: Irrevocable and transferable documentary credit
values.comment: The documentary credit is irrevocable and may be transferred to a second beneficiary.

values.label: Revocable and transferable documentary credit
values.comment: The documentary credit is revocable and may be transferred to a second beneficiary.

values.label: Revocable and transferable standby letter of credit
values.comment: Revocable and transferable standby letter of credit.

values.label: Irrevocable and transferable standby letter of credit
values.comment: Irrevocable and transferable standby letter of credit.

values.label: Pre-advised direct debit
values.comment: The transaction is a direct debit about which the debtor has advised his bank prior to the creditor raising the direct debit, giving his bank permission to debit his account.

values.label: Non pre-advised direct debit
values.comment: The transaction is a direct debit about which the debtor has not advised his bank prior to the creditor raising the direct debit.

values.label: Irrevocable reimbursement of cash withdrawal
values.comment: The transaction is an irrevocable direct debit, from bank A to bank B, which reimburses bank A that has by agreement provided cash to a customer of bank B.
